issue.title: [C++] Do not require flatbuffers or flatbuffers_ep to build
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-6634](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6634). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Flatbuffers is small enough that we can vendor `flatbuffers/flatbuffers.h` and check in the compiled files to make flatbuffers_ep unneeded
